actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 1 of H. Res. 1230. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on December 21, 2022.

The House received a message from the Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Clerk notified the House that she had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on December 16, 2022, at 12:21 p.m.: That the Senate passed: S. 688, S. 2793, S. 3957, S. 5168, H.R. 681, H.R. 2724, H.R. 4250, H.R. 7181, and that the Senate agreed to S. Con. Res. 16.
The Chair designated Mr. Kahele to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Speaker announced approval of the Journal. Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable John P. Sarbanes to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
